reg_pit.title:
Railway Property Designation and Form of
Transfer Regulation

change.changenote: Note: This regulation has been placed in the Regulations Point in Time collection. This regulation is not repealed.

reg:regulation.reg:title:
Railway Property Designation and Form of
Transfer Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 370/2008, December 9, 2008]

bcl:section.bcl:text: The real property and rights, titles and interests described in the Schedule are designated railway property for the purposes of section 45 of the British Columbia Railway Act.
This regulation is the prescribed form of transfer for the purposes of section 45 (5) of the British Columbia Railway Act.
